name: ADRENA
description:
The Gaik & Verk Tribes have been feuding for years but the Gaik have always avoided confrontation by hiding where the snow falls. Adrena is tired of that! She wants to fight and she has the power to do it.

MOVEMENT INPUT - 

MOVE - WASD

FIRE PROJECTILE - LEFT MOUSE

SPRINT - SHIFT

PAUSE - ESC

JUMP - 

SPACEBAR

*ALSO ADDED CONTROLLER SUPPORT JUST NOT IN THE UI*

#UE4SpringJam 

This game was developed by one person with the help of some online assets which are listed below.

Sourced Asset List

Infinity Blade IceLands

Quixel Megascans

Paragon Phase

Environment Sounds

Footsteps With Blueprints

Rogue 2

Whooshes & Impacts
